title: I Miss My Little Poro Pet
body:
I earned my pet with the nexus coins and I mainly play ARAM. I noticed we don't have the pets anymore, ever since they took off Nexus Blitz. Please make our Poros come back. We didn't grind them for nothing. :(

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Msa6iyhzmV0/maxresdefault.jpg
I just want my spooky partner in crime
